mapper.sql: id, `name`, price, surplus, img_url, description, details, del_flag, `status`, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, remark
mapper.select: select pp.* from pro_product pp left join pro_product_product_classify pppc on pp.id = pppc.product_id left join pro_product_classify ppc on pppc.product_classify_id = ppc.id where ppc.id = #{id}
